tool_description: This API provides stats for Warzone and Multiplayer.
name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare
title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare

api_list.name: Warzone Matches
api_list.description:
A match history for given **gamertag** and **platform**

`https://call-of-duty-modern-warfare.p.rapidapi.com/warzone-matches/{gamertag}/{platform}`

required_parameters.name: platform
required_parameters.description:
- psn      **PlayStation** 
- steam  **Steam**
- battle  **BattleNET** 
- xbl        **XBOX** 
- acti     **Activision ID**
- uno     **numerical representation of Activision ID**

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://call-of-duty-modern-warfare.p.rapidapi.com/warzone-matches/Amartin743/psn"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "call-of-duty-modern-warfare.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://call-of-duty-modern-warfare.p.rapidapi.com/warzone-matches/{gamertag}/{platform}"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Multiplayer Stats

required_parameters.description:

- steam
- xbl
- battle
- uno (Activision ID)
- acti (Activision Tag)

        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Multiplayer Match
api_list.description:
A multiplayer match for given **match ID** and **platform**

`https://call-of-duty-modern-warfare.p.rapidapi.com/warzone-matches/{gamertag}/{platform}`

required_parameters.name: platform
required_parameters.description:
- psn      **PlayStation** 
- steam  **Steam**
- battle  **BattleNET** 
- xbl        **XBOX** 
- acti     **Activision ID**
- uno     **numerical representation of Activision ID**

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "call-of-duty-modern-warfare.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "call-of-duty-modern-warfare.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())
